list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: evidence or argument establishing or helping to establish a fact or the truth of a statement.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you will be asked to give proof of your identity
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn sẽ được yêu cầu đưa ra bằng chứng về danh tính của bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a trial impression of a page, taken from type or film and used for making corrections before final printing.
the strength of distilled alcoholic liquor, relative to proof spirit taken as a standard of 100.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Rum 132 chống bảo hộ mạnh mẽ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a test or trial of something.
able to withstand something damaging; resistant.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the marine battle armor was proof against most weapons
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giáp Battle Marine đã bằng chứng chống lại hầu hết các vũ khí

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: denoting a trial impression of a page or printed work.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a proof copy is sent up for checking
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một bản sao được gửi để kiểm tra

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make a proof of (a printed work, engraving, etc.).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: proof each plate and print it on acetate first
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bằng chứng mỗi đĩa và in nó trên acetate trước
